author: Steve_OS
title: WWE 2K16 Video - New Online Features
text: # 1 IowaAJ @ 10/26/15 09:19 AM Looks like they put a lot of work into the online modes this year. # 2 pmurray20 @ 10/26/15 11:28 AM other than 2k tonight or whatever that is it doesn't really pop at me saying must buy still. one of these days wishing for an online mode where I can play with a friend one control raw other smackdown like an online gm mode or universe now that would b a must buy # 3 IIITRE @ 10/26/15 12:59 PM Quote: Originally Posted by pmurray20 other than 2k tonight or whatever that is it doesn't really pop at me saying must buy still. one of these days wishing for an online mode where I can play with a friend one control raw other smackdown like an online gm mode or universe now that would b a must buy But u can do that with shareplay. Just a thought Sent from my SM-N910V using Tapatalk # 4 sooperb @ 10/26/15 01:17 PM Quote: But u can do that with shareplay. Just a thought Sent from my SM-N910V using Tapatalk Now you see that? Just like that pmurray and IIITRE created a whole new mode just by combining thoughts. Gotta love it.
